message: The answers generated by the model are not relevant to the questions.
The answer relevance metric threshold could have been set to a very high value.

If the answer relevance threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the question and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are indeed not relevant. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration if needed.
The answers generated by the model are relevant to the questions.
The answer relevance metric threshold could have been set to a very low value.

If the answer relevance metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the question and answer values of the transactions with low values and determining if the answers are indeed relevant. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration if needed.
The contexts retrieved from the retieval system are not relevant to the questions.
The contexts retrieved are not relevant due to issues with the retieval system.
The context relevance metric threshold could have been set to a very high value.

If the context relevance is low due to issues with retrieval system, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the violated transactions and determining if the contexts are indeed not relevant. Some of the possible issues with retrieval system are the document corpus did not have the relevant data, the retrieval search is not able to return the relevant data even if its present in the document corpus due to issue with embedding model or chunking mechanism. Try changing the embedding model or chunking parameters.

If the context relevance metric threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the violated transactions and determining if the contexts are indeed not relevant. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration.
The contexts retrieved from the retieval system are relevant to the questions.
The context relevance metric threshold could have been set to a very low value.

If the context relevance metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the transactions with low values and determining if the contexts are indeed relevant. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration if needed.
The answers generated by the model are not faithful or grounded to the provided contexts.
The model did not use the information passed in the context to generate the answer and used its own training data knowledge.
The faithfulness metric threshold could have been set to a very high value.

If the model did not use the context information, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are indeed not faithful. If yes, the model prompt could be updated with additional instructions to ground the answer based on the context only. If the violations exist even after updating the prompt instruction, try using a different model.

If the faithfulness threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are indeed not faithful. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration if needed.
The answers generated by the model are faithful or grounded to the provided contexts.
The faithfulness metric threshold could have been set to a very low value.

If the faithfulness metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the transactions with low values and determining if the answers are indeed faithful. Find the new threshold value based on the above analysis and change it in the configuration if needed.
The model did not answer the question based on relevant information in the context, but used information which is not relevant to the question.

If the model used the context information which is not relevant to the question, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions. It could be because the context contained more irrelevant data which can happen due to retrieval of more no of chunks or due to large chunk size. If the issue exist even after fixing the contexts, try using a different model.
The model is unable to answer the questions with the provided context.
The model could be unable to answer due to issues with the retrieval system or the model.
Please analyse the unsuccessful requests transactions along with the Retrieval and Answer quality metrics to understand better.
